trans-unit.source: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
"The wonders of Nyx do not belong solely to the gods."
You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
"In the arrogance of my youth, I believed I knew all there was to know. Now, my greatest wisdom is a humble awareness of all I have yet to learn."\n—Teferi
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
Neither Urza nor Mishra would admit it, but it was their similarities, rather than their differences, that drove their obsessive rivalry.
Stranglehold
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Your opponents can't search libraries. If an opponent would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.
"Control the Halo and you control the whole city."\n—Jetmir
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
"If you wish to assassinate a master assassin, you'll have to do better than that."
Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
A witch once foretold that Glavin would die surrounded by unimaginable wealth. Until that moment, he'd taken that to mean he'd be rich.
Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.
"Practice alone will not bring perfection. The practice itself must be perfect. Again!"

trans-unit.resname: P22·10 | Growing Rites of Itlimoc | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Growing Rites of Itlimoc.

trans-unit.resname: P22·10 | Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.) {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

trans-unit.resname: P22·10 | Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The true treasures of our world are found in the wild places, where Ixalli's light shines brightest."\n—Huatli

Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

trans-unit.resname: P22·8 | Purphoros, God of the Forge | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
